property.name: MinTiempoProgramado
property.formula: (select min(A.opetick04_programado) from opetick04 A where A.rela_opetick03 = id_opetick03)

property.name: MaxTiempoProgramado
property.formula: (select max(A.opetick04_programado) from opetick04 A where A.rela_opetick03 = id_opetick03)

property.name: EntregasTotalCount
property.formula: (select count(*) from opetick04 A where A.rela_parenti44 is not null AND A.rela_opetick03 = id_opetick03)

property.name: EntregasTotalCountConBases
property.formula: (select count(*) from opetick04 A WHERE A.rela_opetick03 = id_opetick03)

property.name: EntregasPendientesCount

property.formula: (select count(*) from opetick04 A inner join parenti44 B on B.id_parenti44 = A.rela_parenti44 where A.rela_opetick03 = id_opetick03 AND B.parenti44_nomenclado = 1)
